description: Lists all FHIR import jobs associated with an account and their statuses.

parameters.name: DatastoreId
parameters.description: This parameter limits the response to the import job with the specified data store ID.

nested_items.name: ImportJobPropertiesList
nested_items.description: The properties of a listed FHIR import jobs, including the ID, ARN, name, the status of the job, and the progress report of the job.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The AWS-generated id number for the Import job.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The user-generated name for an Import job.

nested_items.name: JobStatus
nested_items.description: The job status for an Import job. Possible statuses are SUBMITTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED_WITH_ERRORS, COMPLETED, FAILED.

nested_items.name: SubmitTime
nested_items.description: The time that the Import job was submitted for processing.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time that the Import job was completed.

nested_items.name: DatastoreId
nested_items.description: The datastore id used when the Import job was created.

nested_items.name: InputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The input data configuration that was supplied when the Import job was created.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3Uri is the user specified S3 location of the FHIR data to be imported into AWS HealthLake.

nested_items.name: JobOutputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The output data configuration that was supplied when the export job was created.

nested_items.name: S3Configuration
nested_items.description: The output data configuration that was supplied when the export job was created.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The S3Uri is the user specified S3 location of the FHIR data to be imported into AWS HealthLake.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key ID used to access the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: JobProgressReport
nested_items.description: Displays the progress of the import job, including total resources scanned, total resources ingested, and total size of data ingested.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfScannedFiles
nested_items.description: The number of files scanned from input S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: TotalSizeOfScannedFilesInMB
nested_items.description: The size (in MB) of the files scanned from the input S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfImportedFiles
nested_items.description: The number of files imported so far.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfResourcesScanned
nested_items.description: The number of resources scanned from the input S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfResourcesImported
nested_items.description: The number of resources imported so far.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfResourcesWithCustomerError
nested_items.description: The number of resources that failed due to customer error.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfFilesReadWithCustomerError
nested_items.description: The number of files that failed to be read from the input S3 bucket due to customer error.

nested_items.name: Throughput
nested_items.description: The throughput (in MB/sec) of the import job.

nested_items.name: DataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that gives AWS HealthLake access to your input data.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: An explanation of any errors that may have occurred during the FHIR import job.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token used to identify the next page of results to return for a ListFHIRImportJobs query.
